website_summaries.verdict: This mat stands up to use and abuse from thunderstorms, teenage campers, dogs, and spilled food. Hose it off and it's good as new!
pros: Durable and works well for indoor and outdoor use
Great for RVs, camping and patio use
Reversible with 2 designsTreated with UV-stabilizer to hinder sun damage
Includes nylon loops at corners for staking
Easily secured to the ground with camping stakesNylon loop at each cornerTextured surface for traction
Allows the grass underneath to breathe
cons: Fibers can separate if patio chairs get caught in them

customer_reviews.title: Patio perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They are reversible and sturdy. They don't come with stakes so we went to the creek and found interesting rocks. We cleaned them and sprayed a clear varnish on each one then lined the edge of the rug. Works great and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Cormier

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to keep clean by just sweeping or shaking it ...
customer_reviews.text: We use this outdoor rug with our RV. It is easy to keep clean by just sweeping or shaking it off before it gets folded up. It also dries quickly after getting wet. It feels great under your bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lorelei Millet

customer_reviews.title: Nice for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Great lasted for a couple of years would have lasted longer if I kept my dogs off of it
customer_reviews.author: Ana Garcia

customer_reviews.title: perfect camping rug
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, exactly as described, best price I could find
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I have not used this product yet. I am happy with the Quality and color.
customer_reviews.author: Lopick

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get the fold lines out and its not as soft as a rug but it does the job and looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: We put it on our back porch. Hard to get the fold lines out and its not as soft as a rug but it does the job and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tammie Cave

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Have been wanting one of these for the RV for some time. I really liked this pattern and this price is the best I've seen. Shipping was fast and item exactly as described. We haven't used if yet but are looking forward to on our next trip.
customer_reviews.author: jnb

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Rug was delivered on time came with carrying straps, fabric was much softer than one we own before has straps on corners to hold down in wind, drains well very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality mat, love the design! Holds up extremely well in the rain! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: Tong Ciolino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mats for my patio, absolutely love them, easy to setup and look great. Would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: It looks good but does not wear well
customer_reviews.text: This rug is shedding flakes of its plastic material in our second RV season with it. It looks good but does not wear well. It makes a mess which gets tracked into the RV. I'll be looking for something tougher.
customer_reviews.author: Burt

customer_reviews.title: Received patio rug very quickly and in great condition. very nice rug and will work great ...
customer_reviews.text: Received patio rug very quickly and in great condition.very nice rug and will work great for us.very good material this is made of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the Mat! I really like how the strap came with it
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hall

customer_reviews.title: I love my new patio mats
customer_reviews.text: I love my new patio mats! They look and feel great on my patio while I'm dining alfresco in thes last days of summer!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Elward

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Light and easy to bring along while camping. Its cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Kriselle Pons

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: So happy that I bought one a few years back. Never going back to carpet rugs
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Gerdes

customer_reviews.title: It looks great next to my camper
customer_reviews.text: I llllllllove this mat! It looks great next to my camper! : )
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great quality. I have been using it for a while now and it has been perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Awesome quality and arrived in a timely manner!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Quiambao

customer_reviews.title: Its so great because its so easy and lightweight to carry
customer_reviews.text: Its so great because its so easy and lightweight to carry, the fold lines make it nice to fold it back up.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff N

customer_reviews.title: Wife and Family love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this mat! Looks great on the patio area with our new wicker chairs on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Patio Mats 823 Reversible Outdoor Camping Indoor Patio Mat Beige - 9' X 12'
product_meta.description: Patio Mats Patio Mat, 9' x 12': Made of 100 percent virgin polypropylene, Reversible with two designs, Weighs only nine lbs.
feature_bullets: Durable and easy to take anywhere
